On Jan 13, 2009, at 7:50 AM, Subbu Allamaraju wrote:

> 3. Intermediaries do not need to parse the request to route it. The
> media type, if a proper one is used, will indicate what representation
> is being exchanged.


I can't help but cringe at this...  A uniform interface means using an  
application neutral media type.  So the media type is irrelevant to  
the operation.

- Steve
